channel.title: Special Attacks are not working
channel.description: None of my special attacks are working and i am on a Delta source, i have tested on every weapon.. And none of them are working, if you could give me a step by step solution, I will be very thankful

item.title: Special Attacks are not working
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

search for && specialAmount
in client.java

You should see something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 667 && specialAmount > 50){ setAnimation(2927); specialAmount -= 49; hitDiff = 30 + misc.random(35); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(654); }

So just copy such code and paste it under it,
change the id of your weapon, emotes whatever u want

Read full topic
